title: 96/687/EC: Commission Decision of 22 November 1996 adopting the plan allocating to the Member States resources to be charged to the 1997 budget year for the supply of food from intervention stocks for the benefit of the most deprived persons in the Community
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 22 November 1996 adopting the plan allocating to the Member States resources to be charged to the 1997 budget year for the supply of food from intervention stocks for the benefit of the most deprived persons in the Community (96/687/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: For the 1997 financial year, foodstuffs for distribution to the most deprived persons in the Community, pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 3730/87, shall be supplied in accordance with the annual distribution plan set out in the Annex.
The amounts in ecus shall be converted into national currencies using the rates applicable on 1 October 1996 and published in the Official Journal of the European Communities, Series C.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 22 November 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER

(c) and (d) Allocation for Luxembourg with a view to making purchases on the Community market
Beef/veal: ECU 17 260.
Milk powder: ECU 26 718.
In accordance with Articles 2 (3) and 5 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 3149/92, these amounts shall be converted into national currency using the agricultural conversion rate in force on 1 October 1996.
The appropriations needed to cover the intra-Community transfer costs of the intervention products are fixed at ECU 1 million.
